name: Garima Saroj
tag: SIH'22 Winner | Ex Jr. ML Engineer @JupiterAILabs | CSE(AI&ML) '24
bio: A highly motivated, adaptable, and enthusiastic CSE disciple with a strong background in AI/ML, seeking a dynamic and innovative organization to apply my knowledge. I'm experienced in NLP, deep learning, and MLOps, and am eager to work on state-of-the-art projects.
